long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Gotify Pusher  you can easily deliver content from your browser to Gotify instance

Currently Gotify Pusher can send:
- current tab URL
- photo
- selected text
- link
- note

Configuration is straightforward and 100% secure - all data is sent by direct calls to Gotify API and isn't stored or routed anywhere else.
You can add as many apps as you wish, and easily push web content to any of them.
